name: Loek Kasiib, The Whisper of The Abyss
text:
Indestructible, reach

When Loek Kasiib, The Whisper of The Abyss enters the battlefield, gain control of all flooded lands until Loek Kasiib, The Whisper of The Abyss leaves the battlefield. 

Whenever this creature attacks, defending player sacrifices three nonflooded permanents.
